Plot: During the chaotic final weeks of the Vietnam War, the North Vietnamese Army closes in on Saigon as the panicked South Vietnamese people desperately attempt to escape. On the ground, ...
Title: Last Days in Vietnam
Actors: Richard Nixon, Henry Kissinger, Stuart Herrington, Juan Valdez
tomatoConsensus: As gripping as it is inspiring, Last Days in Vietnam offers a surprisingly fresh -- and heart-wrenching -- perspective on the end of the Vietnam War.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 9 nominations.
